snippet: North Dakota’s senators and a congressman will attend a town hall meeting this month to discuss the child sexual abuse problem on the Spirit Lake Indian Reservation.
abstract: North Dakota's senators and one of its congressmen will attend town hall meeting to discuss Spirit Lake Indian Reservation's rampant child sexual abuse problem, which in 2012 led federal government to take over tribe's social services program.
lead_paragraph: North Dakota’s senators and a congressman will attend a town hall meeting this month to discuss the child sexual abuse problem on the Spirit Lake Indian Reservation.

headline.seo: Child Sex Abuse at Spirit Lake Is Lawmakers’ Topic
headline.main: Child Abuse at Reservation Is Topic for 3 Lawmakers
headline.print_headline: Child Abuse at Reservation Is Topic for 3 Lawmakers
